channel.title: CVE Feed for Stark Digital -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Stark Digital -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-47516|2024-08-28T15:37:56.412Z -- stark%20digital -- category%20post%20list%20widget
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Stark Digital Category Post List Widget allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Category Post List Widget: from n/a through 2.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-43966|2024-08-26T16:48:17.639Z -- stark%20digital -- wp%20testimonial%20widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Stark Digital WP Testimonial Widget.This issue affects WP Testimonial Widget: from n/a through 3.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-43966|2024-08-26T15:07:54.281Z -- stark%20digital -- wp%20testimonial%20widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Stark Digital WP Testimonial Widget.This issue affects WP Testimonial Widget: from n/a through 3.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-43967|2024-08-26T15:30:57.938Z -- stark%20digital -- wp%20testimonial%20widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Stark Digital WP Testimonial Widget allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Testimonial Widget: from n/a through 3.1.
